Articles.Content:
I am almost finished on a command pod, so I go into the game and it loads perfectly.

Then I go to use the part and this is what happend:

http://i.imgur.com/yzb2c.png

If you have a idea of what the problem is and you want to test it here is the link(I made it in Maya so its a Maya file): https://www.dropbox.com/s/c0j4v7rtg0trnkh/mk2pod.mb
Um, what did you want it to look like? 0_0
Its already made to my specifications, its not sizing correctly inside of KSP.
Did you take any tutorial? also, perhaps it may have looked good in the Maya program, but in KSP its really big.
Narrowed down the col prate. Maya was exporting it wrong so ran it through 3Ds Max and it seemed to work. NOW ITS TO DAMN SMALL SO IT BLOWS UP.... YOU CANT EVEN SEE IT IN THE VAB!

Narrowed down the col prate. Maya was exporting it wrong so ran it through 3Ds Max and it seemed to work. NOW ITS TO DAMN SMALL SO IT BLOWS UP.... YOU CANT EVEN SEE IT IN THE VAB!

XD Now just make it a LITTLE bit bigger.
